ModMetaData.name: Bone and Ivory
ModMetaData.author: celphcs30
ModMetaData.description:
Bone and Ivory introduces the coveted Ivory material, prized for its quality akin to jade. Butchering wild boars yields 2 ivory while processing elephant tusks or thrumbo horns at a stonecutter provides significant amounts.
Enhancing vanilla features: Retexture and rotatable functionality for the Skullspike!
Delve into macabre d√©cor with:
Tall Torch, crafted from four skulls, perpetually ablaze without need for refueling. Double Skull Spike, two skulls mounted for an eerie display.
For flooring options:
Skull Pathway, your pathway for conquest. Skull Floors, a grisly foundation. Fine Skull Floor, an opulent luxury, albeit costly.
For imposing structures:
Walls crafted entirely from skulls, striking fear into the hearts of onlookers.
[h1]Mod Settings[/h1] Customize crafting costs and materials in Mod Settings: [list] [*] Toggle between skulls or stone blocks for walls [*] Toggle between skulls or stone blocks for floors [*] Adjustable costs (1-20) for all materials [*] Separate cost controls for walls, bone floor, fine floor, and pathway [*] Stone block floors support material selection menu (like vanilla stone tiles) [*] Skull spikes remain unchanged (always use skulls + stuff) [/list] Note: Floor changes require exiting to main menu or restarting the game to take effect.
Explore the depths of your morbid creativity with Bone and Ivory.
